location.title: Your Greek Seaside Escape
location.description1: Nestled in the charming coastal village of Ofrynio, our villa offers the perfect blend of tranquility and convenience. Located in the Kavala region of Northern Greece, you're just a short drive from the historic city of Kavala and the beautiful Nea Peramos coastline.
location.description2: The sandy Ammolofi Beach is just a 3-minute walk away – one of the most beautiful beaches in the region with crystal-clear, shallow waters perfect for families with children.
location.description3: Within walking distance, you'll find a mini-market, traditional Greek tavernas, and a bakery. The famous Kavala port (for ferries to Thasos island) is only 25 minutes by car.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before booking
faq.checkin: What are the check-in and check-out times?
faq.checkinAnswer: Check-in is from 3:00 PM and check-out is until 11:00 AM. Early check-in or late check-out can be arranged upon request, subject to availability.
faq.parkingAnswer: Yes! We offer free private parking for up to 2 vehicles within the property grounds. Street parking is also available nearby.
faq.petsAnswer: Small, well-behaved pets are welcome upon prior arrangement. Please let us know in advance so we can prepare accordingly. A small cleaning fee may apply.
faq.noiseAnswer: This is a family-friendly property in a quiet residential area. We kindly ask guests to respect quiet hours after 11 PM. Parties and events are not permitted.
faq.payment: How do I pay and is there a deposit?
faq.paymentAnswer: We accept bank transfer, cash, or PayPal. A 30% deposit is required to confirm your booking, with the remaining balance due upon arrival. A €100 security deposit is collected at check-in and returned after check-out.
